text: No person may directly or indirectly prohibit, hinder or restrict or attempt to prohibit or restrict the disclosure by any pharmacy, government agency, or other person, of accurate price information regarding prescription drugs, including such disclosure made by means of advertisements in print or broadcast media, or by other means.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 33-721.

1973 Ed., § 33-821.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-81, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 48-804.51.

DC CODE § 48-802.01

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Interference with disclosure of price information prohibited.
